title: Cowboy Junkies 2002-06-11 @ Coach House - San Juan Capistrano, C
description:
The 2002 tour had a lot of interesting performances, and this one is right up there.

 

First, I&#039;d have to say that any show that has both "No Birds Today" AND "You Will Be Loved Again" is going to be on my personal radar. "No Birds" is such a haunting song, and Margo breathes sadness into it.

 

The second highlight of the show is the mini-acoustic set. The band tends to fall into a rut with that, often playing the same songs each tour, but this night they did acoustic versions of "Good Friday" and "Leaving Normal," the latter a personal favorite of mine. I think it has great lyrics, and I love the movie that they originally wrote it for.

 

Finally, the "I&#039;ll Never Get Out of These Blues Alive" encore is pretty amazing. 2002 shows have been rather underrepresented in the downloads; we might have to change that!

 

So pull up a chair, spend a night downloading the show, and then listen. And if you haven&#039;t yet registered for the 4thellamas.com message board, please do so while you&#039;re waiting for your downloads to complete. That way you can vote for the download you want as a Christmas present!
